item.description:
Trevor Lyman has put together an online fundraiser for Jim Forsythe's U.S. Congress run in NH's first district.
www.flytoliberty.com
He is asking for donation of $100 on 2/21. If you can't donate this much, please consider a smaller donation. Getting a large number of donors from NH, even if each donation is small will show the strength of the support. Donations can be made at
www.jimforsythe.com
item.name: Donate to Congressional campaign
